result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Armond Deshawnti Bullocks

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Armond Deshawnti Bullocks not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Armond Deshawnti Bullocks.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Bail/bond hearing held. Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Defense counsel requests a plea and sentencing hearing. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Armond Deshawnti Bullocks not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Armond Deshawnti Bullocks.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for Bail Bond Hearing. Defendant not produced. Arguments heard as to bail. Court denied bail modification as to the no contact order, but will keep the bail motion as to monetary conditions under advisement. Case adjourned for a Scheduling Conference/ Bail Bond Hearing to Br 29.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Armond Deshawnti Bullocks not in court, in custody.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Pre-trial conference held.  Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a bail/bond hearing.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with DMS and her daugher.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES: 
 Defendant Armond Deshawnti Bullocks in court with attorney Jane Jerman.  Defendant Armond Deshawnti Bullocks in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
